segments.text: Are you through with your meal ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am . Could I have the bill , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is your bill . 150 yuan in all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm sorry we don't . We accept credit cards and cash .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'd like to pay by cash .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . ( A few minutes later ) Sorry to keep you waiting . Here is your change .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My pleasure . Welcome to our restaurant next time .
segments.speaker: S1
